definition[0]: a regular increase in the amount of money someone is paid
example[0]: a salary of £18,000, with annual increments of 2.5%
definition[1]: the amount by which a number, value, or amount increases
definition[2]: an amount that is regularly added to someone’s pay
example[1]: Automatic pay increments based on length of service will be abolished.
definition[3]: the amount by which a number, value etc increases
example[2]: The tariff increases by increments of £50.
